topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a23d636368726ebe340000#post_54a23d636368726ebe340000
Could happen; Asian immigration into the USA is on the drastic rise and in only less than five years the number of Asians in the USA doubled.  If the current rate holds out there will by 2030 be as many people of Asian descent in the USA as there are people of Hispanic origins currently in the USA.
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a23d286368725dff1c3000#post_54a23d286368725dff1c3000
Eeyup; in fifty or so years you're going to be hard pressed to find individuals in the USA who are one single race.  The number of interracial marriages, biracial children and such are much larger than in the past.

Currently 1 out of 12 marriages in the usa are interracial marriages, but you have to keep in mind the compounding effect and that's assuming there's no more immigration into the USA ever for the rest of time.  Also 15% of new marriages in the USA in 2010(I know it's a bit outdated) are interracial.

2050 usa:
"What ethnicity are you grandson?"
"What's a 'ethnicity'?"

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a2402d6368720bf7e80200#post_54a2402d6368720bf7e80200
Pretty much.

I know I'm massively spitballing here, but:
[ 63% X ( 100% - 15% ) ] ^ number of generations = how long until caucasians are no longer the majority.

The thing is though that's completely ignoring immigration all together.  Right now there's a massive spike in Asian immigrants into the USA so that "2030 caucasians are going to be the minority" could be 2020 to 2025.

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a24165636872751bae0300#post_54a24165636872751bae0300
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a23f2f6368720c02ad0100#post_54a23f2f6368720c02ad0100
I'm pretty sure we Han Chinese would remain somewhat racially pure for a little longer. There is A LOT of us.[/bq]
I doubt it; the percentage of new marriages every year in the USA that are interracial is going higher and higher; if the current trend holds out by 2050 there's going to be next to no single race babies born in the USA.

"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a2417c636872607e9b0700#post_54a2417c636872607e9b0700
[bq="Ore-O"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a23f2f6368720c02ad0100#post_54a23f2f6368720c02ad0100
I don't mind our country being a melting pot of friendship.[/bq]
More like the melting pot of fucking; giggity giggity.
